item.description:
This Saturday Weston Ski Track is holding Winter Trail Days. Essentially the special deal is
* a snow shoe pass is free for the day
* there are 15 minute free snow shoe demos - so you can try different brands out if you are evaluating buying a pair of snowshoes
* there are some free cross country ski lessons available if you buy a pass and rent gear, but they may be gone already.

Click here for more info from their site http://www.skiboston....

Fee: A trail pass, which you will need if you want to ski, is $15.

Conditions: I called there today (Wednesday afternoon) and currently the 1 mile man made loop is open and will be open Saturday; there is some chance that more terrain will be open only if the 2 inches of snow that fell today somehow survives Thursday's warmer temperatures. So there may only be 1 mile of terrain available. I'm scheduling it for early in the day to beat some of the crowds and to take advantage of whatever natural snow is available.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy in the Santa hat

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Trail Days at Westin Ski Track
